Articles.Content:
Hello All! Been lurcking around the forums for awhile after discovering the game by accident.

Ive been looking for a game like this for years!

Took me a while to get it installed, as I have a sub par laptop, needed to tweak a few things. Got the Demo working, so I decided to go ahead and go full version! 8)

Just got my first full orbit! And almost got a perfect 90 degree one at that! Yay!!

(OK had to brag a bit.. but ill make future posts a little less newbie-ish sounding!)

Hi OxyMoeRon and welcome to the community

Congratulations on your first orbit, it feels good doesn\'t it? And a bit of bragging never hurt anyone.

Let us know when you get to the Mun okay?
